results.title: A Ballerina Finds Her Modern Dance Home: It ‘Feels Limitless’
results.abstract: Lauren Lovette, a former principal with New York City Ballet, has been named the resident choreographer of the Paul Taylor Dance Company.

multimedia.caption: Lauren Lovette, right, rehearsing dancers from the Paul Taylor Dance Company.

results.title: Trevor Noah: Addressing Congress, Zelensky ‘Knew His Audience’
results.abstract: Ukraine’s president must have researched American history before his speech, said Noah (who speculated about how it “could have gone very wrong”).
des_facet: The Daily Show with Trevor Noah (TV Program)
Late Show with Stephen Colbert (TV Program)
Late Night with Seth Meyers (TV Program)

multimedia.caption: “You know he was on Wikipedia last night planning this out,” Noah joked of the Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelensky’s speech to Congress.

results.title: Confronting Grief, With Margaret Atwood, in ‘The Nurse Antigone’
results.abstract: A dramatic reading by Theater of War Productions will include the author and practicing nurses who have held the front line of the pandemic.

multimedia.caption: Margaret Atwood will portray the blind prophet Tiresias in a reading of Sophocles’ “Antigone” on Zoom.
multimedia.copyright: Arden Wray for The New York Times
